English: Ah, there are just too many things to do in the guild.
I'll never get to take a day off for my birthday...
Ah! There's no time for this. I should get started!
Huh? You've already finished organizing the training manuals?
That's right. We had a helping hand today.
A helping hand?
Someone really reliable pitched in. Don't worry about it.
Hmm... Alright. I'll see you tomorrow, then.
Umm... Turan is next, I believe...? ...Oh, dear! She's not on duty today!
It's Mr. Kumuro, then.
Um? What was that just now?
Huh? No more bookkeeping work for today?
Of course! It's all finished!
Already? You normally hand them to me just before I punch out.
Don't worry about it. We actually had two different people on the job today.
...Okay. See you tomorrow, then.
See you. I hope you have a relaxing day today!
Hmm... What's happening today...?
I'm sorry, Mr. Havelock. I couldn't get Ikko's favorite food this time.
Hmm? What do you mean? I already received the red eel.
Ikko just finished chowing it down. Hahaha!
The eel has a very peculiar scar on it. I have never seen such a skill in this continent.
Hahaha... That figures.
Happy birthday. You've got a pretty good friend.
Thank you. Haha, I think so, too.
Hey, wait! Turan, stop!
Ah, you got me.
How could I not know? You were helping me with my work on your day off?
It's your birthday, but there's too much work.
You helped me, even though I was a stranger here. I wanted to help, too.
I want you to get some rest. At least for today.
Heh heh. Thank you, but this is just how I do things.
Don't try to hide next time.
I'm sorry, Veronica.
Please don't be. Thank you for your kind words.
I can call it a day, thanks to you! Let's go grab something good to eat!
I just want to say this.
Happy birthday, Veronica! I'll say this again next year, too.
*Giggle* Thank you, Turan! I'll look forward to it!
Hahaha, a lonely island! It's warm and nice.
Taking a break was not entirely my choice,
but this is nice! There's nothing like a relaxing day on the beach!
Very... good, Zzz… Zzz…
Hmm, are you sure you can pull this off this time?
My friend! When have I ever lied to... *Clears throat* Trust me this time.
We're here on this deserted island to prevent possible accidents.
This warp experiment can tell us if we're living in a multi-dimensional world.
A world like this in a different dimension! How exciting is that?
Hmm, I've brought Rephy like you told me to, but...
Wow! It's the sea! Uncle Oddy, can I go swimming?
Wait a second, fur boy. Could you please do me a favor first?
Yes? What do you want Rephy to do?
You know any adventurous souls out there? One that might want to travel to another world, maybe?
Of course! There are many! You want me to call them?
Then, could you tell your friends to see what's on the other side of that hole?
That's easy! Souls, help me!
Rephy, wouldn't that be a bit dangerous?
It's alright as long as I just leave out the souls of people taking a nap!
Huh? No! Noooo! What do I do? A sleeping soul just went inside it!
Umm.. Where am I?
Good morning, teacher!
Hey, it's the dean! Run!
Where in the world am I?
Mr. Kaulah, what's wrong?
Today is the day our new semester... Umm, your soul seems different today.
Where am I...? I was just taking a nap on that island...
Hahaha, wake up, Mr. Kaulah!
Don't you know? You're... at Orvelia High School, remember?
Are you serious?
What an absurd dream... It is too much for a birthday gift.
Could it be… a precognitive dream?!
Welcome, Your Majesty! It's been a long time!
Nice to see you, Juno. I heard that someone wanted to see me today.
Yes, a VIP is waiting for you, Your Majesty. This way, please.
Greetings, Your Majesty, the Empress of Light. It's been a long time.
Greetings to you. I believe that last time we spoke was over tea.
How have you been, Princess of Silver?
...Pft! Ha, hahahaha!
We agreed to talk without all these formalities, didn't we?
And yet here we are, all stiff and solemn.
Let's take it slow, Scarlet.
As you say, Artemia.
Are you okay being out here without your guards?
It's better this way. Scouting for demon activities will be much more difficult if my identity was revealed.
By the way, what brings you here today? Did the Dark Legion start making moves?
They didn't, but what I'm here for is no less important.
What is it?
Juno, please bring it here!
Yes, Your Highness. Here it is!
I hereby present to you, Juno's Special, Royal Plaaned Cake!
Goodness gracious!!!!!! This is the Penteonian royal family's cake!
Hahaha, happy birthday, Artemia!
Do you like it?
I love it! Thank you, Scarlet...
I've never imagined that I'd be able to eat this cake in Orvel. I used to have this on my birthdays when I was young...
Oh, the taste is exactly the same! How did you do this?
The Plaan spice is a key ingredient, but the plant only grows in Penteonia.
Oh, a friend of mine happens to be a superb alchemist.
Oh, please introduce me to your friend. I would love to buy some of this spice as well.
Hahaha, I'll ask if there's any left.
Please help yourself.
Thank you so much! Here, have some with me, Scarlet.
Oh, I'm okay. It's my birthday gift for you, so...
Oh no, birthday cakes are meant to be shared! Please, here!
Oh, o-okay, then...
Juno's Room inside the Inn
Poor Princess Scarlet...
Requina, can you make more of that Plaan spice?
Hmm, I need to rip this into tiny pieces and dry them.
Her Highness helped me a lot before. It'll be impossible to do it on my own.
This must be cut into more than 100 pieces and then processed to neutralize the toxin.
I really don't get the strange taste of royal families...
Please be safe, Your Highness.
Since Princess Scarlet went out to subdue some demons today,
the castle should be almost empty by now.
I would like to... return this book...
Oh, I'm so sorry. My mind just wandered off.
Um, Blood Chronicles Vol. 4. Your name is... Seria?
Wow! Did you finish reading this huge book already?
There must have been difficult ancient terminologies in it since it's about ancient Vampires...
...Can I borrow the next volume?
Vol. 5 should contain the records about successful cases of devampirization...
Umm... It's a rare book, so you're not supposed to take it outside.
Well, I'll make an exception of you, just for today...
Thanks. Take care.
...Since it's my birthday.
...It's just like any other day in the year. I shouldn't feel so...
Um? Annette! Kara, too!
Didn't you leave to fight the demons?
Yup! I've gathered enough battle data for Kara.
And how could I go somewhere else on this special day?
*Pitapat* What's so special today?
It's the day that I give you this special ink!
D-did you really remember?
Of course! Today is the day I return the rare book, 'Fingerprint of Lua!'
*Sigh* You mean the book is overdue, Annette. Again!
You are 3 weeks late, exactly. You know how much the late fee is then, right?
It'll cost you more than 10 bottles of that special ink.
Argh!!! Please, Leo~! I'm broke this month again!!!!
I should just put you in the blacklist and not lend you any books, then.
Boo! That's not fair! You're so mean, Leo!!
*Sigh* Seriously? I'm being mean? ...Huh? Kara? Why aren't you going with Annette?
My current top priority is practicing humanity.
A notification message from Royal Staff Database:
Today is Leo's 000th birthday.
Happy birthday, Leo.
Ah, th-thank you, Kara.
Now, I will dance to mark the occasion.
D-dance? Wow! Thank you!
A few hours later
U-umm... Kara... Thank you for the dance, but please stop...
The invitation card says it's here... Is it a pub?
It says 'I'll give you the information you need, so please accept this invitation!'…
Maybe I'll be able to find where Esker is...
This looks awfully suspicious, but I should check... Argh, I'm sorry.
Hey! Watch where you're going, you fool... Ow!
...What's that card?
Ah, I received it this morning. It just had a location and time on it.
Huh? That's just like what we received today.
I brought the old man for this, just in case this is something big,
but this nerdy wimp got invited, too?
Everything will be clear once we go inside. I'm going in.
...It's dark inside. Hmm?
Everyone is here! Thank you for accepting my invitation!
Huh? Cassandra? Hey, did you find me a job that pays decently this time?
...Umm? Do you and the old man know each other?
...What's the job?
Oh, why! There's no need to rush things, isn't there?
All you have to do is just enjoy the dinner show that I prepared to celebrate my birthday!
...What???
Oh, Lua, forgive me for wasting precious time.
Come on, don't be so uptight. It's just a dinner.
...The door is locked.
*Giggle* Don't bother. I raised a barrier around here.
You all seem like you know one another, but I do not know you.
For what reason did you want me here?
I've told you already. It's a dinner show.
I just wanted to have fun on my birthday..
with my favorite type of handsome men around me~!
Cassandra, it's okay that you invited me, but really? The old man and the wimp?
Look at them! They're ready to fight you!
*Giggle* I doubt they could resist my charms.
...This smell... nerve gas?
Ah... My head is...
Don't worry, it won't leave any damage.
You see, I know a thing or two about these things.
It'll just make the world beautiful and let you be more honest with yourselves.
Brother, this is my first time meeting you, but you're quite handsome!
How could you use that huge weapon so easily? That's impressive.
Right back at you, my friend. I admire your courage. I mean, you came to this sketchy neighborhood with nothing but a flag.
That tells me you've got guts.
Huh? Say something nice about me, too, old man!
*Giggle* It can't hurt to relax every once in a while, can it?
Furthermore, nothing pleases me more than the smiling faces of handsome men!
This is the best birthday gift ever, everyone!
Ladies and gentlemen who are gathered here on this year's Water's Day.
I, Laias, would like to thank each and every one of you as the Priestess of Golden Shrine.
Water is the source of all life,
and what flows past us to our offspring.
Priestess! You look so pretty today!
Shut up, knucklehead!
Hahaha, I won't bore you with long speeches.
Then, let me commence the purifying ritual of the oasis, the treasure of this desert.
Waaaaaaahhhh!
First, I extinguish the evil energy around the sacred oasis.
May the power of flow be with you.
The golden sand storm sweeps away all that's negative.
May the blessings of the God King be with you.
Lastly!
May the pure water flow over the lands!
The purifying ritual has ended.
Should we start the real ritual now?
Waaa! We were waiting for it, Priestess!
Laias! It was a perfect purifying ritual!
Wasn't it tiring?
Hahaha, not at all.
How could I be tired when all these people are gathered here for us?
Urr... L-L-Laias, you were so pr-pre...
pretty awesome raising that pillar of water back there!
Thank you, Neraxis.
The ritual ended well. It's all thanks to you and Lilia.
Hahaha! I know, right? Who could do it better than a Black Dragon?
Don't get so stuck up, you fool!
Hmph, you're just being jealous, you little brat!
You wish, knucklehead!
Hey, you two! Stop...
You're still so busy, taking care of these children, my love!
Wh-what!? You jerk!
It's been a long time, Yuria.
How was your trip this time?
Hm hm, it was quite good, your highness.
I went to Orvel and made a dress for a lady.
It was such a beautiful dress, it suited her perfectly.
Purple really is a great color for her. Hm hm hm...
…Purple?
Is she, perhaps, from the Daphnel family?
Hm hm, was that too obvious?
She was so adorable and lovely.
Well, a pretty harsh fate awaits her...
If she can find help from those around her,
she'll find the strength to overcome the hardships that await her.
It's good to hear that, hahaha...
How long will you stay here, this time?
Umm, isn't it about time for you to get a new dress, your highness?
Your birthday is coming up, isn't it?
I'm looking forward to it.. what kind of dress should I make this time..?
Is it already that time of the year?
Hm hm hm, please don't be shy, your highness.
Was the last dress too unconventional?
I shall try another design this year...
*Clearing throat* We can talk about my dress later.
After all, I should give you time to settle in, after not having been home for so long,
Well, there is something I wanted to give you.
Oh, this is...
Happy birthday, Yuria!
Since you're always getting me dresses every year,
I prepared a couple of boxes of liquor for you.
I will have the soldiers deliver them to your house.
Oh, is today my birthday?
I, myself, did not know that. Hm hm hm...
I lost track of the days and time as I've traveled.
Thank you so much, your highness.
It's my pleasure, Yuria.
I cannot just receive these precious presents and do nothing in return.
I shall begin preparing a dress for your highness's birthday!
Let me stay here for a while, your highness!
It's been a long time since I got to be in the palace.
Hm hm hm, it will be fun!
Ahaha, ahahaha...
Here it goes, again...
